content.rendered:
Directed by Soundarya Rajinikanth Vishagan.

Written by Dhanush. Anand Goradia. Swati Goradiya. Mohan Nair. Soundarya Rajinikanth Vishagan.

Cast Dhanush(Raghuvaran B.E). Kajol(Vasundhara). Amala Paul(Shalini). Vivek(Azhagu Sundaram). Hrishikesh(Karthik). Samuthirakani(Raghuvaran’s father). Saranya Ponvannan(Bhuvana). Meera Krishnan(Shalini’s Mother). Saravana Subbiah(Prakash). Mobile Murugan(Manikkam). Balaji Mohan(Balaji) . Riaz Ahmed(Press Reporters). Karrthik Ahuja(Award Show Host Male). Bhai Amma(Sweeper (Old Lady)). Rj Ananthi(Press Reporters). Andrews(News Reader). Rajmohan Arumugam(Prakash Lawyer). Lokesh Baskaran(Vasundhara’s Entourage (as Lokesh)). Chettiar(G.M.Kumar). Danny Chugh(North Indian Minister). T.N. Dhananjayan(CDMA Officer). Roshan Alias Dinsh(Minister 2). Aashna Duggal(Vasundhara Construction Engineers). Kaushick Gabriel(Vasundhara Construction Engineers). Shweta Gai(Award Show Host female).Monal Gajjar. Sarah George(Vasundhara’s Entourage). Kimu Gopal(Bank Manager). Arvind Janakiraman(Vasundhara’s Entourage (as Aravind Janakiraman)). Athif Jey(Vasundhara Construction Engineers). Gagan Kapoor(Vasundhara’s Entourage). S. Karthireshan(Shalini’s Father). Sandhiep N.(Vasundhara’s house staff). Singam Nellai(Vasundhara’s House Security). Vaidhyanathan Padmanabhan(Awards Committee Chairman). Florent C. Pereira(Minister Ponnurangam (as Kayal Florent Pereira)). Govinda R.(Prakash’s Henchmen 2). V. Ravichandran(Constable). Venkatesan S.(VIP Constructions Driver). D. John Salem(Vasundhara’s Construction Security). Sandhya(Vasundhara Construction Receptionist). Jayachandran Sethupathi(Police Inspector). Som Shekar(Vasundhara’s Entourage). M.J. Shriram(Anitha’s Father Ramkumar). Ritu Varma(Anitha (as Ritu Verma)). Veera(Prakash’s Henchmen). Vinodh Verma(Vasundhara Construction Engineers). Raiza Wilson(Vasundhara P.A.)

Language Tamil.

Producers Dhanush. Kalaippuli S. Thanu. S. Vinod Kumar.

Production V. Creations. Wunderbar Films.
